name: vibe-remote
description: Remote AI development environment with Vibe-Kanban task management and Claude AI integration

scripts.docker:push: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(grep '"version"' package.json | cut -d '"' -f 4 | head -n 1) && docker buildx build --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64 -t jjdenhertog/viberemote:latest -t jjdenhertog/viberemote:$PACKAGE_VERSION --push .
scripts.release: npm run docker:push && git push && git push --tags

author: Vibe Remote Contributors
